-      );

     }
     return const Text('');

         path = '${attach[i].image}';
         print(path);
+        return GestureDetector(

+              ? Image.network(

+                  fit: BoxFit.fill,
+                )
+              : const Text(''),
+        ),
+      );
       }
       
     }
     return const Text('');
